text: now blood sugar test as the name
suggests it is the evaluation of sugar
level in our blood
now there are different ways of doing
this particular test one is the patient
is need to be fasted for at least 8
hours and then the blood is collected
that is called as blur fasting test now
the second test is post prandial which
means that the patient needs to have his
lunch and then go for a blood test where
the blood sugar level will be testing
now there is an another way of doing
blood sugar test which is called as
random blood sugar now in this
particular test the blood is collected
at any given time and then the randomly
blood sugar level will be checked in the
person's body there is another way of
doing it which is a latest S which
majority of the doctors prescribed for
known diabetic patients and that
particular test is called as hba1c now
this stands for glycated hemoglobin test
now when we are testing hba1c it gives
us a precise detection of blood sugar in
our blood for last 3 months
let us call s hba1c
first and foremost is to diagnose
whether once suffer from type 2 diabetes
mellitus
or even type 1 diabetes mellitus so that
is the very important test done for
detection of diabetes mellitus apart
from that if somebody suffers from a
family history of diabetes or associated
diseases then for ruling out the
presence of diabetes mellitus in one's
body doctor asked us to perform this
particular test now again this
particular test is a routine test which
is done for general profile or general
health profile for a patient
